title: Does iPhone 4s still support WhatsApp? - Quora

response.answer_text: The correct quest should be does whatsapp still support iPhone 4s. In iPhone 4s perspective, the hardware itself still capable for just whatsapp application to run. The problem is the os which apple already stopped the software update for this phone. So it’s now depend on WhatsApp whether they still want to support older iOS version. And maybe because the active user of iPhone 4s still massive, they probably think it’s worth to keep whatsapp compatible with iPhone 4s

Yes but only older versions of the app are functional on the 4s. Features of newer versions of WhatsApp are not supported as Apple stopped supporting the iPhone 4s and so did the developers of WhatsApp.
